body: Don’t bother reading, she ends up in a loving relationship with her rapist and dumps her boyfriend. But what makes it disgusting is that they treat it like her being raped and blackmailed and made to be gangraped, etc is romantic cause he knew her from before and he changes. Like wtf, she’s gonna forgive, fall in love, and feel safe with her rapist?! It’s one thing when we have the usual bizarre hentai logic in your usual hentai, but this story has pretensions to being deeper but it’s message is fucked up.
